thread.title: smile and love…a light in a Medioevo Age
thread.title_full: smile and love…a light in a Medioevo Age - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: monica092
title: smile and love…a light in a Medioevo Age
text:
i can't say how much is rare in this MiddleDarkAge of the umanity, to find a smile and such a lovely respect.
I really want to say thank you to Cesar and to all the wonderful people working at the front desk and to all the people working at the hotel. If you want to visit NY this position is very good for any kind of trip for work or for holiday..if you want to visit Time Square but you don't want to stay in the middle of chaos you can take Metro and go everywhere . Thank you again to all the staff and see you next time.
